content: The Shopping Trends team is independent of the journalists at CTV News. We may earn a commission when you use our links to shop.Read about us. The countdown to Father's Day is officially on. To save you from scrolling, we've sifted through the site to hunt down the best Father's Day gift ideas. Whether they're into camping, gaming, or cooking, you're bound to find something they'll love. **Here are a few of the best last-minute Father's Day gifts that'll arrive on time:** Sign up for anAmazon Prime accountif Amazon Canada is your go-to site for shopping.
